nodes.name: Economic Data Fetcher
nodes.notes: Fetches economic data (Jobs Output Commodities) from USEEIO API for all US states. Output: states/commodities/2020/. Size: 207M. Dependencies: numpy,pandas,requests,json. Processing time: medium

nodes.name: Zipcode Metrics Generator
nodes.notes: Generates zipcode metrics aggregated by industry level from Census ZBP API. Output: us/zipcodes/. Size: 24K. Rate limited: yes. Parallel safe: yes

nodes.name: Zipcode Range Processor
nodes.notes: Retrieves NAICS data for zipcode ranges and creates hierarchical folder structure. Output: us/zipcodes/naics/. Size: 24K. Processing time: slow. Rate limited: yes

nodes.name: Single Zipcode Processor
nodes.notes: Generates data for a single zipcode with hierarchical directory structure. Output: zipcode directories. Size: 24K. Processing time: fast. Parallel safe: yes

nodes.name: NAICS Timeline Aggregator
nodes.notes: Aggregates NAICS data across years (2017-2020) to create timeline datasets. Output: ../../../../community-timelines/industries/naics4/US/states/. Size: 20K. Parallel safe: yes

nodes.name: ZCTA Data Automator
nodes.notes: Generates SQL scripts for different years and processes ZCTA data (2012-2017). Output: output/{year}/. Size: 1.0G. Processing time: slow. Not parallel safe

nodes.name: Zip Folder Structure Creator (2-level)
nodes.notes: Creates zip code folder structure with metadata files using CSV crosswalk. Output: zip folder hierarchy. Size: 1.0G. Processing time: medium. Parallel safe: yes

nodes.name: Zip Folder Structure Creator (5-level)
nodes.notes: Creates zip code folder structure using Excel crosswalk with 5-level hierarchy. Output: zip folder hierarchy. Size: 1.0G. Processing time: medium. Parallel safe: yes

nodes.name: Random Forest Automator
nodes.notes: Automates random forest analysis across multiple files for poverty prediction. Output: output/. Size: 375M. Processing time: slow. Not parallel safe

nodes.name: Individual File Processor
nodes.notes: Individual file processor for machine learning pipeline. Output: output/. Size: 375M. Processing time: fast. Parallel safe: yes

nodes.name: Poverty Predictor
nodes.notes: Machine learning analysis for poverty prediction using multiple models. Output: output/. Size: 375M. Processing time: medium. Parallel safe: yes

nodes.name: Advanced Poverty Analysis
nodes.notes: Advanced poverty analysis with subprocess automation. Output: output/. Size: 375M. Processing time: slow. Not parallel safe

nodes.name: ACS Poverty Data Cleaner
nodes.notes: Cleans American Community Survey poverty data for years 2012-2017. Output: ../output/. Size: 72K. Processing time: medium. Parallel safe: yes

nodes.name: Time Series Data Cleaner
nodes.notes: Time series data cleaning and combination with projection capability. Output: data/. Size: 79M. Processing time: medium. Parallel safe: yes

nodes.name: Zip Merger
nodes.notes: Merges ZCTA data with zip code mappings for geographic integration. Output: hierarchical zip structure. Size: 79M. Processing time: medium. Not parallel safe

nodes.name: ML Regressor
nodes.notes: Machine learning pipeline for time series forecasting using LassoLarsCV. Output: output/. Size: 79M. Processing time: slow. Parallel safe: yes

nodes.name: ML Training Batch Processor
nodes.notes: Automated batch processing for ML data generation across all US states (2017-2022). Output: output/NAICS{level}/{year}/. Size: 76K. Processing time: very_slow. Rate limited: yes. Not parallel safe

nodes.name: ML Data Generator
nodes.notes: Generates comprehensive county-level training datasets with geographic and industry data. Output: output/NAICS{level}/{year}/. Size: 76K. Processing time: slow. API keys required: census_api. Rate limited: yes. Parallel safe: yes

nodes.name: CSV Timeline Merger
nodes.notes: Timeline data aggregation for NAICS industries. Output: output/. Size: 36K. Processing time: fast. Parallel safe: yes

nodes.name: Comtrade Data Fetcher (Azure)
nodes.notes: Fetches trade data from UN Comtrade API using Azure authentication. Output: output/. Size: 15M. Processing time: medium. API keys required: comtrade_azure. Rate limited: yes. Parallel safe: yes

nodes.name: Movie Data Collector
nodes.notes: Movie data collection from TheMovieDB API with similarity analysis. Output: ./. Size: 15M. Processing time: medium. API keys required: themoviedb. Rate limited: yes. Parallel safe: yes

nodes.name: Comtrade Data Fetcher (Basic)
nodes.notes: UN Comtrade data fetching and CSV generation without API key. Output: ./. Size: 15M. Processing time: fast. Parallel safe: yes

nodes.name: EPD Data Fetcher
nodes.notes: Fetches Environmental Product Declarations (EPDs) from BuildingTransparency.org API for all US states and countries. Output: ../../../products-data/{COUNTRY}/{CATEGORY}/. Size: ~500M. Processing time: very_slow (~5+ hours). API keys required: buildingtransparency. Rate limited: yes. Parallel safe: no

nodes.name: EPD Emissions Analyzer
nodes.notes: Analyzes all downloaded EPD YAML files to document emissions-related fields and impact data availability. Output: console report. Size: N/A. Processing time: medium (~29 min for 184k products). Parallel safe: yes
